author: Marc Brunet
description:
Completely reworked the exercises from 3 years ago, better pacing and ramp up = MORE ART GAINS in 30 days. If you were looking for the perfect challenge this October, this is it. Surely. I'd say a no brainer challenge if you have under 5 years of experience 👁️👄👁️
